news.title: Hanoi promotes consumption of farm produce post Covid-19
news.description: From May 30 – June 6, Hanoi will hold Fruits – Farm Produce Week with specialties from around 17 provinces and cites across Vietnam.

news.title: Hanoi industrial production recovers in May
news.description: A positive growth rate of Hanoi’s industrial production in May led to an expansion of 2.6% year-on-year in the January – May period.

news.title: Hanoi delivers aid to almost all people hit by Covid-19
news.description: Most of the aid beneficiaries are thankful to the timely support.  THURSDAY, 28 MAY 2020, 19:00
